data.author: John C. Maxwell
data.quote: Success is due to our stretching to the challenges of life. Failure comes when we shrink from them.

data.author: Orison Swett Marden
data.quote: It is the hopeful, buoyant, cheerful attitude of mind that wins. Optimism is a success builder; pessimism an achievement killer.

data.author: Shirley Bassey
data.quote: It's hard for a man to live with a successful woman - they seem to resent you so much. Very few men are generous enough to accept success in their women.

data.author: Robert Browning
data.quote: A minute's success pays the failure of years.

data.author: George S. Patton
data.quote: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.

data.author: Theodore Roosevelt
data.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.

data.author: Joe Paterno
data.quote: Success without honor is an unseasoned dish; it will satisfy your hunger, but it won't taste good.

data.author: Monica Seles
data.quote: That's the key to success, isn't it? It has to be fun.

data.author: Christie Hefner
data.quote: I don't think about financial success as the measurement of my success.

data.author: Vaclav Havel
data.quote: Hope is a state of mind, not of the world. Hope, in this deep and powerful sense, is not the same as joy that things are going well, or willingness to invest in enterprises that are obviously heading for success, but rather an ability to work for something because it is good.

data.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
data.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.

data.author: W. Clement Stone
data.quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.

data.author: Samuel Smiles
data.quote: It is a mistake to suppose that men succeed through success; they much oftener succeed through failures. Precept, study, advice, and example could never have taught them so well as failure has done.

data.author: Emily Dickinson
data.quote: Success is counted sweetest by those who never succeed.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Success is dependent upon the glands - sweat glands.

data.author: Ambrose Bierce
data.quote: Success is the one unpardonable sin against our fellows.

data.author: Britney Spears
data.quote: For me, success is a state of mind. I feel like success isn't about conquering something; it's being happy with who you are.

data.author: Leonardo da Vinci
data.quote: It had long since come to my attention that people of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them. They went out and happened to things.

data.author: Gabriel Heatter
data.quote: More power than all the success slogans ever penned by human hand is the realization for every man that he has but one boss. That boss is the man - he - himself.

data.author: Malik Bendjelloul
data.quote: Success is not only one thing. It's not only having a nice house in Beverly Hills and driving a nice Mercedes.
